title: Connect
deck: New to Gateway? Come along to Connect
article:
Are you relatively new to Gateway Church? Would you like to learn more about our distinctives as a church family and to consider becoming a member of Gateway Church? 

Connect is your opportunity to do just that. It will be hosted online via Zoom over two evenings by our Lead Elder Caleb Ellwood. Youâ€™re welcome to come and hear more about Gateway and to ask any questions you may have on Thursday 15th and 22nd April from 7.30pm.

For more details and to reserve your place, go to: <https://gateway.churchsuite.co.uk/events/fzb9cp1x>
